'''''Into the Game!''''' is the first installment of the ''{{WSC|0|1}}'' series, authored by [[Nick Eliopulos]]. The book serves as an origin story for the cast, introducing many common conventions of the series, such as the use of [[VR goggles]]. At an unknown date,{{Citation needed}} an audobook version of the novel was released for the Storypod audio system.<ref>{{Citation|url=https://www.storypod.com/products/minecraft-into-the-game|title=Minecraft: Into the Game|website=Storypod}}</ref><ref>{{Citation|url=https://www.amazon.com/Storypod-Minecraft-Learning-System-Interactive/dp/B0DKPZZ3SL|title=Storypod | Minecraft: Into The Game | Token for The Storypod Audio Learning System | SEL Audio Learning & Interactive Fun|website=Amazon}}</ref>

== Synopsis ==
{{quote|Five young [[Minecraft]] players in the real world find themselves transported inside the game they love. But now it’s not a game–and they will have to use everything they know to explore, build, and survive! This illustrated hardcover series will thrill and engage fans of Minecraft and action-packed fantasy stories alike.|author=Description<ref>{{Citation|url=https://www.penguinrandomhouse.com/books/602095/into-the-game-minecraft-woodsword-chronicles-1-by-nick-eliopulos/|title=Into the Game! (Minecraft Woodsword Chronicles #1)|website=Penguin Random House}}</ref>}}

== Trivia ==
[[File:MCWoodsword1MobSquad.jpg|thumb|right|Prototype of the book, featuring its original title.]]
* Initially, the book was intended to go under the name ''Mob Squad!''. This lasted long enough into development that a cover exists with the name. The reason for the change is unknown, however [[Minecraft: Mob Squad|another book]] would be released with the name in 2021.
